pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarā bhikkhunī sāvatthiyaṃ aññatarissā visikhāya piṇḍāya caramānā yena aññataraṃ kulaṃ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.3: Atha kho te manussā taṃ bhikkhuniṃ bhojetvā etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.6: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo nāgaccheyyun”ti, bhikkhuniyo upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.7: “amukasmiṃ, ayye, okāse vāḷā sunakhā caṇḍo balibaddo cikkhallo okāso.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.9: Aññatarāpi bhikkhunī tassā visikhāya piṇḍāya caramānā yena taṃ kulaṃ tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā paññatte āsane nisīdi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.10: Atha kho te manussā taṃ bhikkhuniṃ bhojetvā etadavocuṃ—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.12: Atha kho sā bhikkhunī tesaṃ manussānaṃ etamatthaṃ ārocesi.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.18: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhunī kulaṃ maccharāyissati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:1.20: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:2.1.6: cattāri kulāni— khattiyakulaṃ, brāhmaṇakulaṃ, vessakulaṃ, suddakulaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:2.1.8: “kathaṃ bhikkhuniyo nāgaccheyyun”ti bhikkhunīnaṃ santike kulassa avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:2.1.9: Kulassa vā santike bhikkhunīnaṃ avaṇṇaṃ bhāsati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc55:2.2.2: kulaṃ na maccharāyantī santaṃyeva ādīnavaṃ ācikkhati,
